meanings.definition: A heavy cotton fabric, typically with a printed design, used for curtains and upholstery.
meanings.sent1: I picked out some lovely cretonnes for the new curtains in the living room.
meanings.sent2: The store had a wide selection of cretonnes for different home decor needs.
meanings.sent3: When the cretonnes arrived, they were so big that they could almost cover the entire room!
meanings.sent4: Her love for cretonnes was like a colorful tapestry woven into her home.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns on the cretonnes added a touch of elegance to the room.

meanings.definition: Cretonnes (plural noun): Fabrics of this type.
meanings.sent1: The interior designer recommended using cretonnes for the sofa and chairs.
meanings.sent2: She had a collection of cretonnes in various colors and patterns.
meanings.sent3: The cretonnes in the store seemed to dance with excitement, waiting to be chosen.
meanings.sent4: The cretonnes whispered stories of faraway lands and magical adventures.
meanings.sent5: The soft texture of the cretonnes made them perfect for cozying up on the couch.
